title: Identify Potential Drug Target from Genomic Data
description: A computational biologist needs to analyze genomic data from cancer patients to identify a potential new target for drug development.

tasks.description: Access a cancer genomics database (e.g., TCGA).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully connects to the database and selects the relevant patient cohort.

tasks.description: Perform a differential gene expression analysis between tumor and normal tissues.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent runs an analysis and identifies a list of genes that are significantly overexpressed in tumor samples.

tasks.description: Cross-reference the overexpressed genes with a database of 'druggable' proteins.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds that one of the genes, 'GENE-X', codes for a kinase, which is a druggable target.

tasks.description: Generate a target profile report for 'GENE-X' for further investigation.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent compiles a report with the analysis results and literature evidence supporting 'GENE-X' as a target.
